subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: The American Paul Malignaggi stopped the previously undefeated Ukrainian Vyacheslav Senchenko in the ninth round to take the World Boxing Association welterweight title in Donetsk, Ukraine.
snippet: The American Paul Malignaggi stopped the previously undefeated Ukrainian Vyacheslav Senchenko in the ninth round to take the World Boxing Association welterweight title in Donetsk, Ukraine.
